winterhold:ElementalStone.NAME: Elemental Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill an non-minion enemy, heal HP equal to your #ywinterhold:Combo, then set your #ywinterhold:Combo to 0.

winterhold:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

winterhold:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
winterhold:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

winterhold:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
